contextDescription: Introduction to APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) and implementation of REST API clients for data retrieval and processing in Python
learningObjectives: Understand what APIs are and their purpose in software integration
Learn how to interact with REST APIs programmatically
Implement Python scripts to retrieve data from external services
Process JSON responses from API calls
Export data to different formats (CSV and JSON)
Apply proper error handling for API requests
Structure API response data in different formats
Understand the transition from Bash to Python for system administration tasks
Use the Python requests library for HTTP requests
Recognize common REST API patterns and practices
prerequisites: Basic understanding of Python syntax and libraries
Familiarity with JSON and CSV data formats
